name: Alien Conquer
description:
ALIEN CONQUER

Explore the Galaxies with Astronaut Jim, on a game that takes you on a amazing journey over the vast unknown of the outer space.

Universe, Aliens, Lasers and Explosions, Like you have never seen before!

The Universe is in danger, A new Alien race has arise, and it is prepared to dominate the world. HELP JIM DEFEND US! Before its to late.
